price: Baravuga bati “Nimumwubakire itanura maze mumujugunye mu muriro ugurumana.”
arabic: قَالُواْ ٱبۡنُواْ لَهُۥ بُنۡيَٰنٗا فَأَلۡقُوهُ فِي ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qālū ib'nū lahu bun'yānan fa-alqūhu fī al-jaḥīmi
